mapper.sql: te_id, te_name, te_age, te_birthday, education, graduate_school, speciality, te_email, te_phone, office_phone, postal_address, other_contact, senior_talent_project
mapper.select: select top ${pageSize} p.te_id, p.te_name, p.te_age, p.te_birthday, p.education, p.graduate_school, p.speciality, p.te_email, p.te_phone, p.office_phone, p.postal_address, p.other_contact, p.senior_talent_project, o.social_security_id, o.unit, o.interior_department, o.participation_date, o.continuous_working_date, o.post_category, o.present_position, o.present_position2, o.job_level, o.technical_position, o.present_technical_position_date, o.job_level_date, o.present_post, o.leading_rank, o.non_leading_rank, o.present_job_date, o.start_date, o.technical_level, o.technical_level_date from (select row_number() over(order by te_id asc) as rownumber,* from TeacherPersonalInfo) as p INNER JOIN Teacheroccupationalinfo o ON p.te_id=o.te_id where rownumber>((#{pageIndex}-1)*#{pageSize});

SELECT p.te_id, p.te_name, p.te_age, p.te_birthday, p.education, p.graduate_school, p.speciality, p.te_email, p.te_phone, p.office_phone, p.postal_address, p.other_contact, p.senior_talent_project, o.social_security_id, o.unit, o.interior_department, o.participation_date, o.continuous_working_date, o.post_category, o.present_position, o.present_position2, o.job_level, o.technical_position, o.present_technical_position_date, o.job_level_date, o.present_post, o.leading_rank, o.non_leading_rank, o.present_job_date, o.start_date, o.technical_level, o.technical_level_date FROM Teacherpersonalinfo p INNER JOIN Teacheroccupationalinfo o ON p.te_id=o.te_id

SELECT p.te_id, p.te_name, p.te_age, p.te_birthday, p.education, p.graduate_school, p.speciality, p.te_email, p.te_phone, p.office_phone, p.postal_address, p.other_contact, p.senior_talent_project, o.social_security_id, o.unit, o.interior_department, o.participation_date, o.continuous_working_date, o.post_category, o.present_position, o.present_position2, o.job_level, o.technical_position, o.present_technical_position_date, o.job_level_date, o.present_post, o.leading_rank, o.non_leading_rank, o.present_job_date, o.start_date, o.technical_level, o.technical_level_date FROM Teacherpersonalinfo p LEFT JOIN Teacheroccupationalinfo o ON p.te_id=o.te_id WHERE p.te_id = #{teId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
distinct
from TeacherPersonalInfo
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into TeacherPersonalInfo (te_id, te_name, te_age, te_birthday, education, graduate_school, speciality, te_email, te_phone, office_phone, postal_address, other_contact, senior_talent_project) values (#{teId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{teAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{education,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{speciality,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{teEmail,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{tePhone,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{officePhone,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{postalAddress,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{otherContact,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{seniorTalentProject,jdbcType=NCHAR})

update TeacherPersonalInfo
te_id = #{record.teId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
te_name = #{record.teName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
te_age = #{record.teAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
te_birthday = #{record.teBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
education = #{record.education,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
graduate_school = #{record.graduateSchool,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
speciality = #{record.speciality,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
te_email = #{record.teEmail,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
te_phone = #{record.tePhone,jdbcType=NCHAR},
office_phone = #{record.officePhone,jdbcType=NCHAR},
postal_address = #{record.postalAddress,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
other_contact = #{record.otherContact,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
senior_talent_project = #{record.seniorTalentProject,jdbcType=NCHAR},

update TeacherPersonalInfo set te_id = #{record.teId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, te_name = #{record.teName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, te_age = #{record.teAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, te_birthday = #{record.teBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, education = #{record.education,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, graduate_school = #{record.graduateSchool,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, speciality = #{record.speciality,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, te_email = #{record.teEmail,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, te_phone = #{record.tePhone,jdbcType=NCHAR}, office_phone = #{record.officePhone,jdbcType=NCHAR}, postal_address = #{record.postalAddress,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, other_contact = #{record.otherContact,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, senior_talent_project = #{record.seniorTalentProject,jdbcType=NCHAR}
